RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory type preference (anal)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to stuff prey up their butt. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to posternate prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Ravenous analist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves posternating [PAWN_possessive] prey, to the exclusion of other types. It may as well be a second mouth for [PAWN_objective].

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Analist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes posternating [PAWN_possessive] prey. Not to be confused with an analyst.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Anal-ambivalent pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about posternating prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Anal-averse pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes posternating [PAWN_possessive] prey. That's an exit, not an entrance.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Anal-abhorring pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates posternating [PAWN_possessive] prey. Maybe it just hurts, maybe it's disgusting to [PAWN_objective].

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory type preference (cock)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to sound prey down their cock. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to unsow prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Ravenous phallicist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves unsowing [PAWN_possessive] prey, to the exclusion of other types. The serpent hungers!

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Phallicist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes unsowing [PAWN_possessive] prey. Spunky!

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Cock-ambivalent pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about unsowing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Phallic-averse pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes unsowing [PAWN_possessive] prey. What sane person would willingly let a whole person thrash around against their gonads?

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Phallic-abhorring pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates unsowing [PAWN_possessive] prey. It just takes one nick, one errant nail or tooth, and then you have a bladder infection.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory type preference (nipple)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to stuff prey into their nipples. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to unnurse prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Ravenous mammilist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves unnursing [PAWN_possessive] prey, to the exclusion of other types. It's the quickest way to a heaving bosom!

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Mammilist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes unnursing [PAWN_possessive] prey. Milk's good.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Mammary-ambivalent pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about unnursing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Mammary-averse pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes unnursing [PAWN_possessive] prey. Figuring out the symmetry is just such a pain.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Mammary-abhorring pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates unnursing [PAWN_possessive] prey. There's no quicker way to destroy your spine.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory type preference (full tour)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to swallow down prey and show them their whole digestive tract. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to give prey a full tour.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive guiding pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves guiding [PAWN_possessive] prey through [PAWN_possessive] body, to the exclusion of other types. There's just nothing quite like feeling them go *all* the way through!

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Guiding pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_pronoun] likes guiding [PAWN_possessive] prey through [PAWN_possessive] body. It's fun to let nature take its course.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Guiding-ambivalent pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about guiding prey through [PAWN_possessive] body.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Guiding-averse pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes guiding [PAWN_possessive] prey through [PAWN_possessive] body. It's annoying to have someone stuck inside your guts for so long.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Guiding-abhorring pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates guiding [PAWN_possessive] prey through [PAWN_possessive] body. Being backed up with prey for so long is an awful sensation.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory type preference (oral)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to gulp prey down their throat. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to swallow prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Ravenous oralist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves swallowing [PAWN_possessive] prey, to the exclusion of other types. No other type's gonna give you a *taste* sensation!

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Oralist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_pronoun] likes swallowing [PAWN_possessive] prey. [PAWN_pronoun] is a fan of the classics.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Oral-ambivalent pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about swallowing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Oral-averse pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes swallowing [PAWN_possessive] prey. It's just so overdone.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Oral-abhorring pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates swallowing [PAWN_possessive] prey. Prey generally all feel pretty good, but they sure don't all taste good.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Predatory type preference (vaginal)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to stuff prey up their muff. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to unbirth prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Ravenous yonicist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves unbirthing [PAWN_possessive] prey, to the exclusion of other types. [PAWN_pronoun] has what's known as an "alpha-beaver".

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Yonicist pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes unbirthing [PAWN_possessive] prey. What comes out, must go in. Or something like that...

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Yonic-ambivalent pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about unbirthing prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Yonic-averse pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes unbirthing [PAWN_possessive] prey. Giving birth is painful enough.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Yonic-abhorring pred
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates unbirthing [PAWN_possessive] prey. It's a total perversion of the reproductive system.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish type preference (anal)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to be stuffed up predators' butts. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to get posternated.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive analist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves to be let in through the back; to be posternated, derried, undumped, anally-vored.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Analist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes to be posternated. It's a cozy kind of warmth and tightness in there.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Anal-ambivalent prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being posternated.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Anal-averse prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes being posternated. It's (probably) gross and it (probably) stinks up there.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Anal-abhorring prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates being posternated. There is no treasure to be found in the waste disposal chute.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish type preference (cock)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to be sounded down a predator's cock. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to get unsown.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive phallicist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves to clean pipes, to sound up, to feed the trouser snake; to be unsown, unjerked, cock-vored.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Phallicist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes being unsown. The nads make for a delightful cum-bath.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Phallic-ambivalent prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being unsown.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Phallic-averse prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes being unsown. It's tight as hell and the loop around the bladder is the worst.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Phallic-abhorring prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates being unsown. The cock is supposed to go in you, not around you.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish type preference (nipple)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to be stuffed into a predator's nipples. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to get unnursed.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive mammilist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves to dive into dugs; to be unnursed, unsuckled, bathe in milk, be breast-vored.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Mammilist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes being unnursed. Milk's good for your skin, or something like that.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Mammary-ambivalent prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being unnursed.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Mammary-averse prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes being unnursed. You suck nipple, not the other way around.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Mammary-abhorring prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates being unnursed. Breasts don't even have one big mammary gland!

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish type preference (full tour)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes take a tour through a predator's insides. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to get sent through the whole digestive tract.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive tourist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves to get close with every inch of a predator's insides, from the very top to the very bottom.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Tourist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes touring through guts. It's a lovely variety of sensations all the way through.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Tour-ambivalent prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about taking full tours.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Tour-averse prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes taking full tours. Guts get rough when they need to push you through like that.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Tour-abhorring prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates taking full tours. The thought of being trapped in claustrophobic intestines and handled like food alone makes [PAWN_objective] shudder, let alone actually being there!

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish type preference (oral)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to be gulped down a predator's mouth. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to get swallowed.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive oralist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves to be swallowed whole, gulped down, licked all over, orally-vored.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Oralist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes being swallowed. It's a classic for a reason; you don't get that kind of tongue action elsewhere!

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Oral-ambivalent prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being swallowed.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Oral-averse prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes being swallowed. Teeth are scary.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Oral-abhorring prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates being swallowed. It triggers a kind of primal fear in [PAWN_objective].

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Preyish type preference (vaginal)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how much a pawn likes to be stuffed up a predator's muff. At the extremes, the pawn will either never or always try to get unbirthed.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Obsessive yonicist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] loves to swim the channel; to be snatched up, clamshelled, unjilled, unborn.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Yonicist prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] likes to swim the channel; to be snatched up, clamshelled, unjilled, unborn.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Yonic-ambivalent prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] doesn't really care one way or the other about being unborn.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Yonic-averse prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] dislikes being unborn, especially if the unbirther tries to act like [PAWN_possessive] parent afterwards.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Yonic-abhorring prey
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] hates being unborn. Once is enough!
